host_addresses_rule.insight: Having more than one A record usually means traffic is being load balanced or routed through a CDN. Ensure that all backend servers are properly patched and configured to avoid inconsistencies or vulnerabilities.

name_servers_rule.message: Default or ISP-provided name servers in use
name_servers_rule.insight: Using default or ISP-managed DNS can expose you to manipulation or interception. Consider switching to managed or hardened DNS providers and enable DNSSEC to improve security.

defaults.insight: No issues detected based on existing rules. Confirm that DNS records are correct, exposure is intentional, and review configuration for potential misconfigurations.
